conclusion: Given data: mass of the pillow is m1, mass of the child is m2, angle between the rope and vertical is β, angle of the guide rail is α.
Expression for the force exerted by the pillow on the child is F_pillow = m2 * g.
g is the acceleration due to gravity.
Expression for the tension in the rope is T = m1 * g * cos(α).
Ratio of the tension of the rope to the force exerted by the pillow on the child is T/F_pillow = (m1 * cos(α)) / m2.
Final answer: The ratio is (m1 * cos(α)) / m2.
